resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

activityTypeId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

summary.ai_hint: Brief description of the activity - max 255 characters

activityId.description: ID of the activity to update

limit.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: contactId

options.description: Description of the task - max 100,000 characters

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'activityTypeId'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'contacts'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'happenedAt'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'summary'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'activityId'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'activityId'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'activityId'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'call' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'call' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'call' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'calledAt'
IF resource == 'call' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF resource == 'call' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'callId'
IF resource == 'call' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'callId'
IF resource == 'call' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'call' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'call' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'callId'
IF resource == 'call' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'contact' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'firstName'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'genderId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'contactField' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'contactField' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contactField' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactFieldTypeId'
IF resource == 'contactField' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'data'
IF resource == 'contactField' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactFieldId'
IF resource == 'contactField' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactFieldId'
IF resource == 'contactField' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contactField' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'contactField' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'contactField' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'

IF resource == 'contactField' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactFieldTypeId'
IF resource == 'contactField' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'data'
IF resource == 'contactTag' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'contactTag' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contactTag' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'tagsToAdd'
IF resource == 'contactTag' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contactTag' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'tagsToRemove'
IF resource == 'conversation' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'conversation' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'conversation' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactFieldTypeId'
IF resource == 'conversation' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'happenedAt'
IF resource == 'conversation' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'conversationId'

IF resource == 'conversation' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactFieldTypeId'
IF resource == 'conversation' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'happenedAt'
IF resource == 'conversationMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'conversationMessage' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'conversationId'
IF resource == 'conversationMessage' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'content'
IF resource == 'conversationMessage' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'writtenAt'
IF resource == 'conversationMessage' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'writtenByMe'
IF resource == 'conversationMessage' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'conversationMessage' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'conversationId'

IF resource == 'journalEntry' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'journalEntry' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'journalEntry' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'post'
IF resource == 'journalEntry' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'journalId'

IF resource == 'journalEntry' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'journalEntry' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'journalId'
IF resource == 'journalEntry' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'note' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'body'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'noteId'

IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'reminder' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'frequencyType'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' AND frequencyType IN ["week", "month", "year"] THEN SHOW parameter 'frequencyNumber'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'initialDate'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'reminderId'

IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'reminderId'
IF resource == 'reminder' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF frequency_type IN ["week", "month", "year"] THEN SHOW parameter 'frequency_number'
IF resource == 'tag' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'tagId'

IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'tagId'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
